items.name: Shortsword
items.description: A small, damaged sword. Gets the job done.

items.name: Longsword
items.description: A long iron sword. The balance of the blade feels good.

items.name: Iron Spear
items.description: A long iron spear.

items.name: Scimitar
items.description: A short curved sword capable of causing deep slash wounds.

items.name: Iron Mace
items.description: A small, rusty iron mace capable of staggering those hit by it.

items.name: Cleaver
items.description: A short, rusty meat cleaver. Weak but intimidating.

items.name: Morningstar
items.description: A large and heavy morningstar. Capable of staggering enemies and causing bleeding

items.name: Bone Shears
items.description: Rusty scissors that are a little hard to use. Slow but capable of causing immense damage.

items.name: Ritual Spear
items.description: A simple spear used by primitive tribes living underground.

items.name: Axe
items.description: A typical multi-purpose hand axe.

items.name: Shark Teeth
items.description: A crude makeshift saw made from razor-sharp teeth.

items.name: Shark Teeth
items.description: A large scythe. Capable of damaging multiple enemies at once.

items.name: Claymore
items.description: A large two handed sword. Packs a punch.

items.name: Eastern Sword
items.description: A delicate blade hailing from the far east. Sharp but fragile.

items.name: Blue Sin
items.description: A fine and light short sword with blue carvings on its hilt and blade.

items.name: Skeletal Arm
items.description: An arm taken from a skeleton. Why would you want to use this?

items.name: Crude Sword
items.description: A massive jagged longsword. How do you even hold this thing?

items.name: Sergal Spear
items.description: A heavy throwing spear used by sergal tribes from the west.

items.name: Miasma
items.description: An otherworldly sword that oozes toxic gases. The sword is said to house the strength of six men.

items.name: Firestarting Kit
items.description: A box full of firestarting tools. Fires keep fear in check and offer warmth and safety.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A long stick wrapped with thick rags to prolong its burning.

items.name: Lucky Coin
items.description: A coin that can be used in dire situations. Flipping it and choosing heads or tails can greatly boost stats and luck.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: A miraculous concoction that heals your body completely.

items.name: Potion of Sanity
items.description: A potion that recovers your sanity completely.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: A strong-smelling vial that strengthens your body.

items.name: Purifying Talisman
items.description: A paper talisman with markings that originate from Eastern Sanctuaries. Using it grants you immunity to the next attack.

items.name: Priest's Lantern
items.description: A lantern from a dark priest. You can toss it at your enemies for a small fire attack.

items.name: Bear Trap
items.description: A strong trap that will cause severe damage.

items.name: Bone Saw
items.description: A rusty blood-stained bonesaw. Good for dealing with infections.

items.name: Skinning Knife
items.description: A small knife used for skinning animals and other living creatures.

items.name: King's Crown
items.description: A golden crown with ornate enscriptions and jewels embedded all over. It must be worth fortunes.

items.name: Gnome Egg
items.description: An egg found inside the cavemother's body.

items.name: Gnome Milk
items.description: A vial full of yellow colored gnome milk. Ew.

items.name: Gnome Milk
items.description: A vial full of yellow colored gnome milk. Ew.

items.name: Kitchen Cabinet
items.description: A damaged wooden cabinet. Who knows what's inside?

items.name: Kitchen Drawer
items.description: A run-down drawer. Who knows what's inside?

items.name: Rusty Toolbox
items.description: A rusty handheld toolbox

items.name: Ornate Box
items.description: A worn down box with elaborate golden details along a velvet surface. Probably owned by someone of high status.
